𐙹 ≈ 𐘍 ≈ 𐙱 *325 𒀭 •van/niq 𜐪𜏌 ?

𐚜 ≈ 𐊭 Τ @ Carian ( 𐛌 𐘷 𐚜 𐘿 ÇE 𐚸 𐘆 DI ) 𐙱 ≈ 𐊭 Τ @ Carian ? 𐙱 ≈ 𐘍 ZA /tsa/

Rare syllabic determinant?

𐘉𐙱𐘍 U-𐙱-ZA U-NU-ZA Venus ♀ 𐘇𐙱𐘍 A-𐙱-ZA A-RE-ZA Mars ♂ 𐀀𐀩𐀊 a-re-ja αρεία 𐀩 ≈ 𐙱 ? 𐘇𐙱𐘍 A-𐙱-ZA A-SH-ZA Ashur ? ☑ 𐘇𐙱𐘍 A-𐙱-ZA A-ME-ZA Hermes ☿

The last readings are supported by juxtaposing the words (the last one with high frequency) 𐘇𐘞𐘞𐘴𐙱 A-SA-SA-RA-𐙱 Ashur 𐘱𐘞 JA-SA Yasser Yasir 𓂀 Osiris 𓁹 𓊩 because of 𐘱 eye 'secret, bound' 𐘱𐘞𐘞𐘴𐘋 JA-SA-SA-RA-ME

𐘞 𐘽 SA-RA₂ is second most frequent word

𐘞𐘴𐙱 SA-RA 𓇳 ⵙ 𔗆 in

𐘭𐘿𐘠𐘇𐘞𐘞𐘴𐙱 RI-QE-TI-A-SA-SA-RA-*325

𐚻 𐘫𐙱 PU.niq phoenix palm 𓂬 𔐨 𐚻 𐙱𐘫 van.PU 𐘌𐘫 QA₂PU 𐘍𐘫 ZA.PU 𐚼 𐘌𐘫𐘙 QA₂PU·RE a metal?

𐀡𐀛𐀑𐀊 po-ni-ki-ja φοινίκιος purple phoenix

𐘉 𐀄 u humor ≈ amore => 𐙱 mars 𐘇𐙱𐘍 ᵐA-RE-ZA 𐀀𐀩𐀊 a-re-ja αρεία Mars ?

𓋹 𓈖 𓐍 𜎯𜐪𜏌𜏵 Pinikir "Venus" Phoenike 𓃀 𓈖 𓅣 Venus !
